data.actual_result: It doesn't close, saying "Something is wrong with your credit card number", making you click twice to close it.
data.short_description: Closing out Nitro payment with a random card number says error with a card number.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to nitro tab, and attempt to add a new payment method via credit cards. - On the credit card number section, type random numbers in, and attempt to close it with those random numbers in place.
